mapper.select: select count(*) from CUSTOMER where CUS_EMAIL = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER(CUS_ID, CUS_PWD, CUS_NAME, CUS_GENDER, CUS_EMAIL, CUS_ADDR, CUS_TEL, CUS_BIRTH ) VALUES(#{CUS_ID}, #{CUS_PWD}, #{CUS_NAME}, #{CUS_GENDER}, #{CUS_EMAIL}, #{CUS_ADDR}, #{CUS_TEL}, #{CUS_BIRTH})
